org.sd.cluster.config
Class DataPusher

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.cluster.config.DataPusher

public class DataPusher
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class to push or spray data from one node to others.

Author:
Spence Koehler

sendFileToNode

public static void sendFileToNode(java.lang.String absoluteSourcePath,
                                  java.lang.String destMachine,
                                  java.lang.String absoluteDestPath)
Send the given file (possibly a directory) to the identified node.

Parameters:
absoluteSourcePath - The file to send.
destMachine - The machine to send to (with optional "user@" prepended).
absoluteDestPath - The destination path of the file.

symLinkFile

public static boolean symLinkFile(java.lang.String absoluteSourcePath,
                                  java.lang.String absoluteDestPath)
Create a symlink to the source at the dest.

Auto-create dest dirs.

copyLocalFile

public static boolean copyLocalFile(java.lang.String source,
                                    java.lang.String dest,
                                    boolean moveIt)
Copy (or move) local file (or directory) from source to dest.

Auto-create dest dirs. If moveIt, then rename the file; otherwise, force recursive copy.

getJobDirPostfix

public static java.lang.String getJobDirPostfix(java.lang.String jobIdString,
                                                java.lang.String dataDirName)
Get the job directory postfix suitable for the destDirPostfix arg of sendDataToNodes.

sendDataToNodes

public static void sendDataToNodes(ClusterDefinition clusterDef,
                                   java.lang.String destGroupName,
                                   java.lang.String destDirPostfix,
                                   java.lang.String partitionedDir,
                                   java.util.regex.Pattern destPattern,
                                   int patternGroupNum,
                                   int maxThreads,
                                   int timeout)
Given a directory whose entries match the given pattern, send each element to the destination cluster nodes.

Parameters:
clusterDef - the cluster definition.
destGroupName - specifies the destination cluster ndoes.
destDirPostfix - specifies the portion of the destination directory after the "jvm-N/" part.
partitionedDir - local directory containing partitioned files.
destPattern - pattern for directory entries to be sent.
patternGroupNum - designates the matching group that identifies the destination node.
maxThreads - the maximum number of threads to use for transfer (<=0 for unlimited).
timeout - time to wait for termination in seconds.
